step1Desc: We work with independent chefs, chosen for their experience and professionalism.
step2Desc: Indicate the date, location and type of service. We propose suitable chefs.
step3Desc: Menus, values and service details are agreed upon before confirmation.

manifesto.title: Chef on Demand
manifesto.intro: We believe that gastronomy is not a service. It is an act of presence.
manifesto.worldContext: In a fast-paced, standardized, and impersonal world, we choose the opposite:
manifesto.p1: Chef on Demand is born from a deep respect for the craft. For the chef's gesture. For the silence before the service. For the detail that cannot be explained, only felt.
manifesto.p2: We do not believe in manufactured experiences. We believe in meals designed for real people, in real places, at the right time.
manifesto.p3: Here, the chef is not a supplier. They are a professional with identity, method, and responsibility. And the client is not a number. They are someone who chooses with criteria and demands with reason.

tech.main: Technology exists to serve the essential, not to replace it.
tech.item1: That is why we created a platform that simplifies without impoverishing,

manifesto.conclusionTitle: Chef on Demand is not about luxury.
manifesto.finalStatement: We are here to return to gastronomy what it should never have lost: respect, truth, and intent.

about.title: Chef on Demand
about.intro: Chef on Demand is a premium platform for personalized gastronomic services, connecting professional chefs with clients seeking private, flexible, and high-quality culinary experiences.
about.model: We operate at the intersection of gastronomy, hospitality, and technology, with a model designed to be simple for the client and fair for the professional.
about.market: Designed for the demands of premium tourism, the mid-to-high residential market, and contexts where time, trust, and predictability are essential.
about.freedom:
At Chef on Demand, chefs maintain total creative freedom and control over their services:

• Set menus and tasting menus
• One-off or multi-day services
• Total adaptation to each context.
about.client:
Direct and transparent access to available offers, with speed and decision-making power in a few steps.

No long processes, no email requests, no undefined negotiations.
about.notAgency: We are not a traditional agency. We create structure and tools so that the service happens with quality, consistency, and responsibility.
about.vision: Chef on Demand is built by industry professionals, for industry professionals, with a clear vision of growth, scale, and internationalization — without ever compromising the rigor of the craft.

services.title: The Art of Service
services.intro: Each context requires a unique approach. We have designed three service dimensions to ensure your expectations meet the chef's precision.

private.title: Private Dining
private.desc: The focus is the private experience. Ideal for celebrations or moments where gastronomic rigor and company are the only priorities.

stays.title: Stays & Vacations
stays.desc: The solution for premium stays and tourism. Daily gastronomic management with consistency and total adaptation to your pace.

bespoke.title: Bespoke Events
bespoke.desc: For contexts that demand a unique response. From corporate to private events rigorously designed to measure.
